column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Beat Salad - A beautiful presentation of colors. There were plenty of golden and red beats on the plate along with dollops of goat cheese
column3: and sliced grapefruit down the middle and all on top of arugula. Try all these ingredients in one bite
column6: and aromatic flavors in one bite. I really wish they gave us more arugula as we found ourselves finished the last bites of goat cheese and beats without the arugula touches.
